sentences.sentence: The Apollo 9 Command module was called Gumdrop, on account of the blue cellophane wrapping in which the craft was delivered.
sentences.translation: 阿波罗9号的指挥舱被称为 Gumdrop ，因为飞船是用蓝色玻璃纸包裹的。

sentences.sentence: This is a day where all gumdrop lovers can join together and appreciate the sugary candy.
sentences.translation: 这一天，所有的果糖爱好者们可以聚在一起鉴赏这糖果。

sentences.sentence: This combination of almond and gumdrop could be a good style of value added food rich in organic juice and various vitamins.
sentences.translation: 这种杏仁和软糖的组合是一种富含有机果汁和多种维生素的高附加值食品。
